channel.title: Does someone know such book
channel.description:
A few years ago I found a self-publishing web site with mostly IT books. There was a book from an IT auditor which described four architectural patterns that he have observed in every successful application that he have audited in his career.
Unfortunately I cannot remember now neither the web site nor the book (thought it was Packtub, but it's not)
Does someone know this book or such site (Googling doesn't helped me) ?

item.title: Does someone know such book
item.dc:creator: unboot
item.description:
Once you remember the book author and title, try bookfinder.com to find (used) copies.

Read full topic

item.title: Does someone know such book
item.dc:creator: Atanas_Walker
item.description:
thanks, this was the web site (unfortunately the book is no longer there, but other interesting titles grabbed my eye)

Read full topic
